name: NexGrill
0:
”"Alexa, what is the temperature of my grill"”
”"Alexa, what is the temperature of probe 1"”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: Monitor your temperature of your NexGrill with Alexa. Discover the NexGrill skill in the Alexa app and link your account that you signed up with in the NexGrill app. You can now ask Alexa what your probes and grill temperatures.
